popular_hooks.section_subtitle: Proven templates used by top creators to capture attention and drive engagement
popular_hooks.cta_text: Ready to use these powerful hooks in your threads?

vulnerability.title: Vulnerability Hooks
vulnerability.description: Share authentic failures and struggles that led to unexpected success. Build deep connection through honesty.
vulnerability.example: I lost $50k in my first startup. 6 months later: $200k revenue. Here's what nobody tells you about failure:

contrarian.title: Contrarian Hooks
contrarian.description: Challenge popular beliefs with surprising evidence. Stand out by going against the grain.
contrarian.example: Everyone says 'work smarter, not harder'. I did exactly that. Failed spectacularly. Here's the truth they don't tell you:

data_proof.title: Data Proof Hooks
data_proof.description: Back up your claims with hard numbers and metrics. Let data do the convincing.
data_proof.example: I tested 47 headlines. 43 failed. These 4 generated $12,000 in revenue. The exact breakdown:

case_study.title: Case Study Hooks
case_study.description: Show real transformation stories with specific results. Prove what's possible with concrete examples.
case_study.example: $0 to $10k MRR in 90 days. No funding. No team. Here's the exact system we used:

storytelling.title: Storytelling Hooks
storytelling.description: Use dramatic moments and emotional journeys. Stories stick in people's minds forever.
storytelling.example: 3am. My bank account showed $47. My daughter needed medicine. That moment changed everything. The story:

listicle.title: Listicle Hooks
listicle.description: Share tested tactics and actionable lists. Easy to scan, easy to implement, easy to share.
listicle.example: I tried 25 productivity hacks. 20 wasted my time. These 5 actually worked (and cost $0):

question.title: Question Hooks
question.description: Ask provocative questions that demand answers. Trigger curiosity and engagement instantly.
question.example: Why do 97% of content creators quit in their first year? I studied 500 accounts. Here's the real reason:

curiosity_gap.title: Curiosity Gap Hooks
curiosity_gap.description: Create irresistible intrigue with unexpected insights. Make it impossible not to keep reading.
curiosity_gap.example: This 5-minute habit generated 50,000 followers. 99% of creators ignore it. What I learned:

urgency.title: Urgency Hooks
urgency.description: Highlight time-sensitive insights and changes. Create FOMO and immediate action.
urgency.example: LinkedIn's algorithm just changed. Next 30 days will separate winners from losers. Here's what to do now:

achievement.title: Achievement Hooks
achievement.description: Share milestone breakdowns with every lesson learned. Inspire through transparency.
achievement.example: Just hit 100k followers. 18 months. Started with 0. Here's every mistake, lesson, and tactic that worked:
